div.p:
Reports made are anonymous and will be seen by the Superintendent and any other appropriate reporting authorities.

div.p:
Due to recent developments the Governor of Texas has ordered that the May election be postponed until the General Uniform November Election date. Onalaska ISD is complying with this order and more information will be shared as soon as the Board takes action.
The next election for the Onalaska ISD Board of Trustees will be held on Saturday, May 2, 2020. Elections are held at the district unless a Joint Election . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Board of Trustees Election May 2, 2020
Event Date: April 25, 2020, Event Time: 8:00am, Event Title: FFA State CDE TX Tech
